messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deathly Course XIII. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Experimentation Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deathly Course XIII. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deathly Course XIII. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deathly Course XIII. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deathly Course XIII. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: AI is fucking rogue, cut cams!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Deathly Course XIII. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.
